dct_title_s: Map showing wooded and prairie tracts in the region in the vicinity of the Bow and Belly Rivers embracing the southern portion of the District of Alberta and part of Assiniboia, Northwest Territory; by George M. Dawson, assisted by R.G. McConnell.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Includes notes. 1 map: col.; 59 x 67 cm
dct_creator_sm: Geological and Natural History Survey of Canada
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
